programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Sonic must save a family of sloths from Dr. Robotnik's slow-motion ray, but when he himself is slowed down by Scratch and Grounder, Tails and the sloth family must take action.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Desperate to get workers to build a Robotnik statue, Dr. Robotnik opens Casino Night Zone with his pal Smiley but when Sonic stops Scratch and Grounder, Robotnik traps Tails so Sonic has to make a choice to save his pal.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Robotnik imprisons a satirical cartoonist named Sketch Lampoon for making fun of him in his comic book, much to the anger of Sonic, his biggest fan. Sonic purposely allows his own capture as well, but does not expect to be placed in a maximum-security jail cell. With Robotnik angrily sends Sonic in the cell for interfering with his plans once again.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Scratch, Grounder and Coconuts set up a chili-dog trap which then resulted with Tails been captured by a mysterious person so Sonic has to find Tails and for Robotnik and co to capture Sonic.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.sub-title: Close Encounters of the Sonic Kind
programme.desc: While Scratch and Grounder try to catch Sonic using a Suction plate, two aliens, one being a prince, crash lands on Mobius. Sonic meets the prince when he finds out that the prince's baby brother would blow up Mobius which Sonic must save.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Robotnik's momma escapes from the home for mothers of villains and demands her birthday present! When she endangers Sonic and Tails, and they manage to have her taken back to the home, even Robotnik is glad to see her go.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Coconuts is exiled by Robotnik to a remote jungle, where he uses a giant baby ape to destroy villages. But Sonic exposes Coconuts as a robot, and the baby ape's real Dad takes Coconuts and the baby ape away for a spanking.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: A country and western singer released a song about Sonic which is making Dr. Robotnik mad and builds a music destroyer robot.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: An energetic salesman named Wes Weasley sells Robotnik numerous gadgets to help Scratch and Grounder capture Sonic. However, Robotnik later comes to regret it when Weaseley's gadgets keep backfiring.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Sonic and Tails rescue Lucas, Robotnik's first prisoner, and attempt to reunite him with his girlfriend, Lucinda. However, Robotnik is also in love with Lucinda, and pursues Lucas.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: En route to stop a train of explosives from arriving at Robotnik's munition factory, Sonic and Tails must deal with a duo of bears named Big Griz and Big Mike after Scratch and Grounder tell them that Sonic and Tails are the enemies.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Robotnik takes Professor Von Schlemmer hostage and uses his growth machine to try and enlarge himself. However, the machine backfires, and enlarges Tails instead in nearby Wienerville. Sonic must keep the famished Tails from getting into more danger as Robotnik tricks the citizens into thinking that Sonic is the villain, while Robotnik is the hero planning to save the city.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: When Sonic decides to find Tails a suitable foster home to ensure his safety, Robotnik finds out and creates a robot fox family, who pose as Tails' long-lost parents.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: When overweight, elderly superhero Captain Rescue bungles in his attempts to help Sonic, he grows tired of his incompetence. Robotnik then uses Captain Rescue to successfully imprison Sonic in an impenetrable force field, and Tails and Captain Rescue must save him.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Scratch suffers a blow to the head and believes that he is his favorite television character, Edgar Eagle. Sonic uses this to his advantage in preventing another of Robotnik's schemes.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: There is a Sonic Appreciation Day happening where Sonic is the guest in a hotel. However, someone steals his power sneakers and now Sonic and Tails have to find the culprit.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Tails adopts a cute and fuzzy pet named Walter who turns out to be a black hole who sucks up everything in Mobius. Realizing that Walter is from another dimension our heroes have to return him and they soon find themselves spinning through interdimensional limbo.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: When Robotnik opens up a resort to make the resident Mobians his slaves, Sonic enlists the help of some robots from an area of Mobius called Scrap Valley.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Robotnik creates a robot Sonic suit with the intent of ruining the hedgehog's reputation. He forces a lab rat named Laurence to pilot by threatening his parents.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Dr. Robotnik creates a genius chip so he would have enough brains to rule Mobius, however a computer hacker got hold of it which then the chip landed inside Grounder causing him to be smart.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Sonic leaves Tails in charge of protecting a squirrel village food supply, when he zips off to stop a dam from breaking. Robotnik sends Scratch and Grounder after Tails, who defends himself the best he can with Home Alone booby traps for Scratch and Grounder. When Tails is finally caught, Sonic speeds back to save him.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Robotnik introduces the Ultra Freeze-O-Matic, announcing his plan to freeze every citizen on Mobius so that he can install Servitude Chips into the frozen citizens and make them unquestionably obedient. Sonic and Tails must foil the scheme.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: When Robotnik invades Labyrinth, an underwater city, and kidnaps Princess Bubbles, a seahorse-dude named Surff seeks Sonic's help. It seems Surff and the Princess are in love, but the royal family deems Surff unworthy. Sonic, Tails and Surff must avoid the undersea traps and Mobius sea monsters while Sonic rescues the Princess and reunites her with Surff -- making it look like Surff did the whole thing.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Robotnik reprograms a machine created by Von Schlemmer capable of turning dreams into reality, unleashing a Nightmare Monster upon Mobius.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: When S and G rocket to outer space to mine a radioactive mineral from asteroids, Sonic and Tails stow away. Through a blunder by the robots, all are stranded in space, and Robotnik tries to blow all of them out of the stars. Sonic builds a rocket out of S and G's spare parts, and all return to Mobius.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Robotnik's attempt to turn Sonic into an old man with his newest device backfires, turning him and Tails, and later himself, into babies. Now stuck in a day-care, the infantile Sonic and Tails must try to keep Robotnik under control, while Scratch and Grounder attempt to get him back.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Robotnik plans to block out the sun and extinguish all life and nature on the planet Mobius. Then he creates a robot son and tries to train him in the ways of wickedness. But when Robotnik Jr. meets Sonic, he becomes a naturalist and teams up with Sonic to thwart Robotnik's evil scheme.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Robotnik invents an electron altering generator which makes Scratch and Grounder twice as fast as Sonic. When they lose it and Tails picks it up, Tails speeds through the Mobius countryside leaving disasters and accidents in his wake. Seeing this, Robotnik convinces the villagers that the little fox belongs in jail, and Tails is forced to flee. With Tails all alone, Scratch and Grounder attack, and Sonic makes a last minute rescue.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Robotnik captures a Kangaroo named MacHopper, and uses his brain-wipe-reprogramming-computer to transform him into a resourceful demolitions expert (Ala MacGiver). But Mac escapes before Robotnik installs the final Get Sonic program, and teams up with Sonic and Tails to BLAST Robotnik.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Sonic joins up with a group of Dr. Robotnik's rejects who have been banished to the dump and helps them understand that their shortcomings were really their strengths.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: When S and G rocket to outer space to mine a radioactive mineral from asteroids, Sonic and Tails stow away. Through a blunder by the robots, all are stranded in space, and Robotnik tries to blow all of them out of the stars. Sonic builds a rocket out of S and G's spare parts, and all return to Mobius.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: When a Rebel Base is threatened by Robotnik, Sonic and Tails team up with Big Mike and Da Bears to run a booby-trapped gauntlet in their gigantic Road Warrior-like truck, breaking through every obstacle S and G put in their way until they save the rebels.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Robotnik pretends to retire, and lures Sonic and Tails into a phony vacation resort, laden with booby-traps set by Scratch and Grounder. But Sonic takes the bungee jumping, hang gliding, and skydiving in stride, and gives the bashes the bots.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Robotnik and a rival named Quark Rex try to cooperate in capturing Sonic. However, Sonic tricks them into becoming enemies, and they try to outdo each other.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Coconuts acquires a magic wand and magical gadgets from Wes Weasley (after agreeing to forward all payments to Robotnik), and attempts to master them. Meanwhile, Robotnik tries to change Sonic-themed mobium banknotes into Robotnik banknotes in the Mobius Mint.

programme.title: Love Shriners
programme.desc: Dynamic Media Partners - Shriners - PP SHFFT8CGTH

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.sub-title: Super Special Sonic Search and Smash Squad
programme.desc: When Sonic and Tails are captured by Grounder and Scratch, Sonic tricks them into letting them escape by reminiscing about how they all met. Several badniks seen early on in this episode later resurfaced in Dr. Robotnik's Mean Bean Machine.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: While on pursuit with Scratch and Grounder, Sonic and Tails hide in an underground mine which a miser mole think that they are trespassers.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Sonic saves a female hedgehog from Scratch and Grounder which Sonic falls in love with, while Dr. Robotnik plans to flood a village by stealing the water from the Mobius reservoir.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Sonic saves a female hedgehog from Scratch and Grounder which Sonic falls in love with, while Dr. Robotnik plans to flood a village by stealing the water from the Mobius reservoir.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Sonic must save a family of sloths from Dr. Robotnik's slow-motion ray, but when he himself is slowed down by Scratch and Grounder, Tails and the sloth family must take action.
